segments.text: Can you believe that Obama was actually elected ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can believe it , and I am very excited about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you voted for him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I did . Didn ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have total faith in Obama as our President .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I have faith that he will help America turn over a new leaf .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our country really could use some work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe that change has already begun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I no longer need to worry about what will happen with this country .
segments.speaker: S2
